entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Hawkesbury
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:52 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing to periods of rain or snow late this evening then to periods of snow overnight. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late in the morning then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
